definition: to open a river/to dig a canal/to thaw (of river)

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
thawing and opening up of frozen river in spring

sentences.english: The landlord aunt is always telling me much information about the Xinkai River.
sentences.chinese: 房東大娘總是會跟我講關於新開河的見聞。

sentences.english: Don't spout off at the mouth about how the story is dumb.
sentences.chinese: 不要信口開河地評論他的需求是多麼的愚蠢。

sentences.english: Public works, digging ditches, war has the same effect.
sentences.chinese: 公共事業，開河挖溝，發動戰爭都有同樣的效果。

sentences.english: However, the method of predicting ice-cover breakup based on mechanical principle has been lack of.
sentences.chinese: 但至今仍缺乏以力學機制爲基礎上的開河預測方法。

sentences.english: The old sailor love to spin yarn about his life at sea.
sentences.chinese: 那老水手愛信口開河地講他的航海生涯。

sentences.english: You lay there on the bed, leaking, and I comforted you.
sentences.chinese: 你躺在牀上，信口開河，我安慰你。

sentences.english: He spoke offhandedly, making it clear I had no say in the matter.
sentences.chinese: 他信口開河，明顯表示這件事我無權發言。

sentences.english: Fritz is loud mouth who can not be trusted with secrets.
sentences.chinese: 費瑞茲是一個信口開河的人，不能把機密告訴他。

sentences.english: She never thinks before she speaks. She just shoots from the hip.
sentences.chinese: 她說話總是不經大腦就信口開河。

sentences.english: He always shoots his mouth off and says things he later regrets.
sentences.chinese: 他總是信口開河，結果盡說些讓自己事後後悔的話。

sentences.english: Egrets look for food in the Xinkai River estuary in north China's Hebei province.
sentences.chinese: 中國北部河北省，白鷺在新開河河口尋找食物。

sentences.english: She had a bad habit of spouting off.
sentences.chinese: 她有個信口開河的壞毛病。

sentences.english: Bones: I hate it when you make paranoia plausible.
sentences.chinese: 你這人偏執起來信口開河的時候還真討厭。

sentences.english: Loose lips really can cause trouble.
sentences.chinese: 信口開河可真能帶來麻煩。

sentences.english: So I made this works about the Xinkai River.
sentences.chinese: 所以我做了這個和新開河有關的作品。
他信口開河地作完了他的演說。
